criteria: Ability to locate relevant information on personal health products.
Ability to evaluate the validity of health product information.
Understanding of different types of personal health products.
descriptions: Student demonstrates no ability to locate information on personal health products.
Student can locate very limited information on personal health products with significant difficulty.
Student can locate some information on personal health products, but struggles with identifying relevant sources.
Student can locate relevant information on personal health products from common sources with some guidance.
Student can effectively locate relevant information on personal health products from various sources.
Student can efficiently and comprehensively locate relevant information on a wide range of personal health products from diverse and reliable sources.
Student demonstrates no understanding of how to evaluate the validity of health product information.
Student attempts to evaluate information but shows no understanding of validity criteria.
Student identifies some basic criteria for validity but struggles to apply them effectively.
Student evaluates the validity of information using common criteria (e.g., source reliability) with some inconsistencies.
Student consistently evaluates the validity of information using appropriate criteria and identifies potential biases or inaccuracies.

Student expertly evaluates the validity of information, demonstrating a deep understanding of research methodologies, source credibility, and potential biases, and synthesizes information from multiple sources to form well-supported conclusions.
Student demonstrates no knowledge of any personal health products.
Student identifies only one type of personal health product.
Student can name a few personal health products but shows no understanding of their usage or benefits.
Student can name several personal health products and shows a limited understanding of their usage and benefits.
Student understands the different types of personal health products, their purposes, and their benefits.
Student has excellent knowledge of personal health products and demonstrates a clear understanding of their purpose, benefits, and potential risks.
